thread.title: Virginia J.

author: Virginia J.
title: Virginia J.
text: The only problem I have with HDIS is the carrierÂ´s disregard of delivering packages to the door. Some of the packages are so large that it is difficult to manage them when left in the mailroom. I always specifically ask that packages "please be delivered to the door" on the order form and often as not the package is left in the mailroom instead. Otherwise, I am extremely pleased with the services and products provided by HDIS.
